snippet: In October 2012, Hurricane Sandy dumped four feet of water into David Lonergan’s bungalow in the Rockaways in Queens. Over two years later, after fixing his house himself, he moved back in.
abstract: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York, one of seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, provides David Lonergan with $1,992 for insurance payment he needed to start his own home improvement business.
lead_paragraph: In October 2012, Hurricane Sandy dumped four feet of water into David Lonergan’s bungalow in the Rockaways in Queens. Over two years later, after fixing his house himself, he moved back in.

headline.main: After a Storm, Celebrating a Hard-Earned Homecoming
headline.print_headline: After a Storm, Celebrating a Hard-Earned Homecoming
